data.title: Alps Alpine
data.meta_description: Browse information on the Alps Alpine CEO Message, Corporate Vision, and Mid-Term Business Plan as well as an introduction to our business and history, and more.
data.text:
CEO Message

Based on our Corporate Philosophy of “Innovating Value for Humans and Society on a Brighter Planet,” Alps Alpine will endeavor to create value for all stakeholders and for sustainable coexistence with the plant Earth.

Corporate Vision

Our mission is to continuously contribute to society based on the core of our three guiding principles: our Corporate Philosophy, Management Approach, and Business Vision.

Value Creation Process & Mid-Term Business Plan

Aiming for sustainable growth and value creation, we have formulated our second medium-term management plan from FY2022 to FY2024 and the vision we aim to achieve by 2027.

Our Business

We are offering products and services that contribute to society with our three business segments of Components, Sensor and Communication, and Module and System, as well as our in-house company, Data Solution Company.
